company.name: LankaSoft Solutions
company.about: LankaSoft Solutions is a leading software development company in Sri Lanka, specializing in enterprise software solutions, mobile applications, and cloud services.

detail.desc: Develop and maintain high-quality software products supporting the organization's standards.
detail.requirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, 2+ years of experience in software development, proficiency in Java and Spring Framework.

company.name: Innovate Lanka
company.about: Innovate Lanka is an innovative technology company focused on creating cutting-edge solutions for global markets, with an emphasis on AI and machine learning technologies.

detail.desc: Work on projects involving neural networks and deep learning.
detail.requirement: Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence, experience with Python and TensorFlow, excellent problem-solving skills.

company.name: TechWave Systems
company.about: TechWave Systems is renowned for its robust telecom solutions and services that cater to the Asian market.

detail.desc: Responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining network infrastructure solutions.
detail.requirement: Bachelor's in Network Engineering or related field, CCNA certification, 3+ years of experience in network administration and troubleshooting.

company.name: CodeCraft Technologies
company.about: CodeCraft Technologies pioneers in the software industry, specializing in customized software solutions for international clients.

detail.desc: Design and optimize user interfaces for our new and existing applications.
detail.requirement: Diploma in Graphic Design, proficiency in Adobe Suite, Sketch, and Figma, at least 1 year of experience in UI/UX design.

company.name: InnoTech Solutions
company.about: InnoTech Solutions is focused on developing high-tech solutions for the agriculture and education sectors in Sri Lanka.

detail.desc: Oversee project life cycles from initiation to closure, ensuring timely delivery and quality standards.
detail.requirement: Bachelor's degree in Project Management or related field, PMP certification, 5+ years of experience in project management, strong leadership skills.

company.name: MobileDev Solutions
company.about: MobileDev Solutions specializes in mobile application development, particularly for Android and iOS platforms, catering to both local and international clients.

detail.desc: Develop and implement mobile applications across various platforms, ensuring responsiveness and great user experience.
detail.requirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, 3+ years of experience in mobile development, proficient in Swift, Kotlin, and Flutter.

company.name: WebTech Global
company.about: WebTech Global offers comprehensive web solutions including web development, e-commerce, and SEO services to clients around the world.

detail.desc: Optimize website content for search engines to increase visibility and traffic.
detail.requirement: Degree in Marketing or IT, proven experience in SEO, deep understanding of Google Analytics and Google Webmaster Tools.

company.name: DataTech Analytics
company.about: DataTech Analytics is at the forefront of data science and analytics in Sri Lanka, helping businesses harness the power of big data.

detail.desc: Analyze large sets of structured and unstructured data to discover patterns and insights.
detail.requirement: Master's degree in Data Science or related field, proficiency in statistical tools and programming languages such as R and Python, excellent analytical skills.

company.name: CloudServ Technologies
company.about: CloudServ Technologies specializes in providing cloud storage and cloud computing services to businesses across Sri Lanka.

detail.desc: Design and implement scalable, secure cloud-based architectures for clients.
detail.requirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, AWS or Azure certification, 4+ years of experience in cloud services architecture and deployment.

company.name: Digital Arts Creative
company.about: Digital Arts Creative is a leading creative agency in Sri Lanka, offering innovative design and marketing solutions to a wide array of clients.

detail.desc: Create visually engaging designs for digital and print media.
detail.requirement: Diploma in Graphic Design, proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop, creative and innovative thinking.
